values.text:
As a member of our community, we'd love to have you join our World Water Day virtual event next week on Thursday, March 22nd, from 10 am  -  1 pm ET.

World Water Day is a global day of awareness for the 785 million people who live without clean water. 
Do you have friends, coworkers, or family members who don't know about the water crisis? 
Invite them to join us on Monday to learn more about our work and your impact.
SIGN UP NOW
You can invite as many guests as you'd like to our World Water Day event. We hope to see you there, Click here to send  your invites

You're receiving this email because you asked us about regular newsletter.
